synopsis.text: Crockovich, a ruthless Mafia boss, and Fujiko, a secretive assistant, are just a few obstacles in the way of master thief Lupin the 3rd's latest quest. The prize: the elusive Trick Diamond, a meteoric gemstone hidden in the heights of Spain's Sagrada Familia cathedral. But to claim this treasure, Lupin must first complete a challenge left by his late rival, Mark Williams. In seven days, Lupin must return five treasures stolen by Mark to their rightful homes. With the Russian casino chief seeking revenge and Inspector Zenigata hot on his trail, Lupin's race against time is filled with twists and turns. Will Lupin succeed in returning the treasures and securing the Trick Diamond, or will he fall victim to the secrets and schemes of those around him? Find out in Operation: Return the Treasure!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
